title: C. elegans and B. thuringiensis cultures 3

content.question: The researchers also found that after 150 days, the relative change in virulence of B. thuringiensis was greater than the relative change in the resistance in C. elegans when the organisms were cultured together. Provide ONE reason that the relative change in B. thuringiensis virulence was greater than the relative change in C. elegans resistance.

frqParts.text: The researchers also found that after 150 days, the relative change in virulence of B. thuringiensis was greater than the relative change in the resistance in C. elegans when the organisms were cultured together. Provide ONE reason that the relative change in B. thuringiensis virulence was greater than the relative change in C. elegans resistance.

skill.text: 6.C: Provide reasoning to justify a claim by connecting evidence to biological theories.
